summary: A sci-fi film about Africa in the future, 35 years after World War III, the water war.
cast: Kudzani Moswela|Chantelle Burger|Tammy Richards|Nicole Bailey|Freddy Djanabia|Anton David Jeftha|Arthur Cornelisser|Marius Botha|Marlon Ryneveldt|Trymore Ndhlovu|Cheslynn|Henry Booysen|Andy Kurehwatira|Wolfgang Wienssenstein
title: Pumzi
